help-file.title: SIZE
help-file.content:
Size is the average of height, length, diameter and weight of a creature.
The size are: None : Almost no size Tiny : 2' or less Small : 2'+ to 4' Medium : 4'+ to 7' Large : 7'+ to 12' Huge : 12'+ to 25' Giant : 25'+ to 50' Gargantuan: 50'+
It has been rumored there are some spells in the game that can change the size of a creature.
